description.lang: The Arrival Sensor assigns everyone an unique ID then the user could take care of the family to send any instant notification when they are coming home or leaving home, also the user could interact some specific scenarios with specific persons. When the device is secure included into Z-Wave network, above communication will be encrypted.ARRIVAL SENSOR supports SECURITY S0 / SECURITY S2 UNAUTHENTICATED / SECURITY S2 AUTHENTICATED.

Define the synchronic interval time between arrival sensor and the gateway, the basic interval time is 16 seconds and the default value is u00222u0022 (32seconds=2x16seconds) 1 ~ 255 (unsigned decimal) Seconds (default: 2 (=16seconds x 2))
